product_name: Leki Cressida Aergon SpeedLock Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The women's Leki Cressida Aergon trekking poles help you cross dicey creek beds and rocky terrain with nimble ease. At less than 15 oz., these poles won't weigh you down. Lightweight Aergon Thermo grips feature an edgeless shape and a foam surface to maximize comfort and minimize hand fatigue. Positive Angle grips position the hands at an ergonomically correct angle for optimal swing efficiency and stress relief at wrists. Aluminum alloy allows thin shaft walls, providing a 20% reduction in swing weight without loss of strength. Simple and fast, Speedlock external locking system adjustment requires little effort to securely lock pole sections into position. 3-section telescoping poles extend from 25.2 - 49.25 in. Baskets provide extra support on soft terrain; interchangeable basket system allows baskets to be easily removed and replaced without special tools. Scratch-resistant surfaces and high polish lacquering protect your poles from abrasion. Leki Cressida Aergon trekking poles feature durable carbide tip ends to optimize grip on ice and rocks.
short_description: The women's Leki Cressida Aergon trekking poles help you cross dicey creek beds and rocky terrain with nimble ease. At less than 15 oz., these poles won't weigh you down.
